it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal
Class Card

java.lang.Object
  it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.base.BaseCard
      it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardUIInferface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionContentCard, BoothContentCard, BoothListFragmentCard, CookieAmountContentCard, CupboardContentCard, ScoutCard, ScoutExpanderCookieList
public class Card
extends BaseCard

Main Card Model

You can customize this component. See https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/doc/CARD.md for more information.

You can easily extend and customize this class providing your inner layout and setting your values with setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method.

Usage: 


     //Create a Card
     Card card = new Card(getContext());

     //Create a CardHeader
     CardHeader header = new CardHeader(getContext());

     //Add Header to card
     card.addCardHeader(header);

Method Detail

getInnerView

public android.view.View getInnerView(android.content.Context context,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup parent)
Inflates the inner layout and adds to parent layout. Then calls setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method to setup all values.

You can provide your custom layout. You can use a xml layout with BaseCard.setInnerLayout(int) or with constructor Card(android.content.Context, int)

Then customize #setupInnerViewElements to set your values.

Specified by:
getInnerView in interface CardUIInferface
Overrides:
getInnerView in class BaseCard
Parameters:
context - context
parent - Inner Layout
Returns:
view

setupInnerViewElements

public void setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                   android.view.View view)
This method sets values to header elements and customizes view.

Override this method to set your elements inside InnerView.

Parameters:
parent - parent view (Inner Frame)
view - Inner View
